name: Uptime Kuma
short_description: Self-hosted uptime monitoring tool. Self-host it with Docker using Yantr.
description: Self-hosted uptime monitoring tool. Self-host it with Docker using Yantr. Uptime Kuma is a self-hosted application focused on tools, network, monitoring, dashboard. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Uptime Kuma on your home server to self-hosted uptime monitoring tool. self-host it with docker using yantr without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Uptime Kuma to manage your tools workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
